page.title: 11Employment
page.content: Altlough it is a farming area the use of{machinery}on farms , has replaced farm workers, most farms have perhaps one workman outside the family. Farms tend to get larger as farmers buy farms which come on the market and {incorporate}the land into their farm using the additional farm house as a home for one of the family or worker. In the main worker travel to factories at{Newport}and{telford,}some men being employed at the{army Deport}at {Donnington,}unemployment is low but about 40% of familes qualify for assietance free school meals etc. The {village}has a{family bus company}but only 3 from the village work there the other shaf menbers live outside the vilage there is also a{family building {company .}There is a small factory in Eaton_on_tern employing 10 people making plastic signs.
